column4: reuben: its wierd because almost all distros work, except ubuntu, the CD wont even load into it
its a fujitsu P series
A3040 Fujitsu
Ive installed opensuse, fedora, mandriva
i just liked ubuntu the best. Plus i did here wifi is good on it
Mandriva is a good, i liked it
i might switch back if i cant get this too work out. Its really wierd though, xubuntu works but not any other ones
which doesnt make sense
Yeah, im pretty much stuck on ubuntu
I like debian
likes/dislikes can be discussed in #ubuntu-offtopic, mate. this channel is for support
alternate cd has text mode
if that disk has OEM, it should have text only mode too
which torrent? if you're accidentally getting an old herd, it will be slow, less seeders
is this herd4?
herd 3
herd 4 is out. id grab that
is it pretty easy upgrading it?
from herd3 -> herd4? oh yes, it's just apt-get upgrade
apt-get upgrade scares me :)
but this is my play laptop anyways
apt-get upgrade hardly ever fails, and if it does, it does so gracefully
i had a problem with samba dieing after i upgraded libc to 2.4. there was a patch but i had no idea how to apply it
